llm_results: [{"detection_name": "LLM: Introspection", "detection": "potential", "category": "Injection Attacks", "description": "The GraphQL response includes an \"__type\" introspection result exposing the 'User' type and its fields (id, firstName, lastName, description, wallets, friends).
